meanings.sent3: The nonsalable items were like unsellable puzzles.
meanings.sent4: Her dream of flying without wings felt as nonsalable as a cloud.
meanings.sent5: The nonsalable car sat in the garage, gathering dust.

meanings.sent2: The handmade crafts were nonsalable in the modern market.
meanings.sent3: Trying to sell ice to an Eskimo would be as nonsalable as selling sand in a desert.
meanings.sent4: Her idea was as nonsalable as a broken promise.
meanings.sent5: The nonsalable artwork failed to attract any buyers at the gallery.
